title: The Brotherhood of Evil Mutrends 8/9: UN Climate Report, Republican Fox, Tigger, Reservation Dogs, Vaccine Mandates, Olympics Closing Ceremonies
itunes:title: The Brotherhood of Evil Mutrends 8/9: UN Climate Report, Republican Fox, Tigger, Reservation Dogs, Vaccine Mandates, Olympics Closing Ceremonies
description:
In this edition of The Brotherhood of Evil Mutrends, Miles and Super Producer Anna Hossnieh discuss the UN climate change report that says "We're Fucked", Republican Fox viewers, a new Karen video featuring Tigger and Pooh, the new comedy "Reservation Dogs", Companies and the Military starting to mandate vaccines, and the 2020 Olympics finally being over.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
